cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Depl_Pkg__c.description: Deployment packages that contain application runtime artifacts of the mobile app.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgc_sync__AggregatedState__c.description: Deployment package state. Possible values are: Initial Revoked Scheduled Published Published (partially)

cgc_sync__Assignment__c.description: Display assignment type and number of assignments per assignment type in .csv format.

cgc_sync__Assignment_to_All__c.description: Deployment package that users can download.

cgc_sync__Assignment_to_User__c.description: Deployment package that a specific user can download.

cgc_sync__Deployment_Type__c.description: Deployment type of the mobile app package. Possible values are: Complete RTA Delta RTA Full Pictures

cgc_sync__Description__c.description: Description of the mobile deployment package.

cgc_sync__Installation_Deadline__c.description: Date and time by when this package must be installed.

cgc_sync__MaxPublishingDate__c.description: Date and time by when this package must be published.

cgc_sync__MinPublishingDate__c.description: Date from which this package can be published.

cgc_sync__Name__c.description: Name of the deployment mobile package.

cgc_sync__Publish_Date_Time__c.description: Date and time when this package is made available to a user's devices.

cgc_sync__Registration_Date_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the deployment package record was created.

cgc_sync__Revoked__c.description: Indicates whether the deployment mobile package is revoked (true) or not (false). A revoked deployment mobile package isnâ€™t available for download.
